chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
forall M A B O O' : PO, isocele O A B -> isocele O M B -> isocele O M A -> isocele O' A B -> isocele O' M B -> isocele O' M A -> (colineaire (vec O A) (vec O' A) /\ colineaire (vec O B) (vec O' B)) /\ colineaire (vec O M) (vec O' M)

Premises:
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula Arguments Tauto.GFormula {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.TT {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.FF {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.X {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.A {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.Cj {TA TX AA AF
colineaire = fun u v : V => R (double (cons u v)) zero : V -> V -> Prop
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
isocele = fun A B C : PO => R (cons (vec B C) (vec B A)) (cons (vec C A) (vec C B)) : PO -> PO -> PO -> Prop
*** [ PO : Type ]
*** [ vec : PO -> PO -> V ]
cocyclique : forall M A B O M' : PO, isocele O A B -> isocele O M A -> isocele O M B -> isocele O M' A -> isocele O M' B -> R (double (cons (vec M' A) (vec M' B))) (double (cons (vec M A) (vec M B)))
angle_inscrit : forall A B M O : PO, isocele O M A -> isocele O M B -> R (double (cons (vec M A) (vec M B))) (cons (vec O A) (vec O B))
tangente_reciproque : forall A B O T T' : PO, isocele O A B -> orthogonal (vec A T) (vec O A) -> R (double (cons (vec A T') (vec A B))) (cons (vec O A) (vec O B)) -> colineaire (vec A T) (vec A T')
tangente : forall A B O T : PO, isocele O A B -> orthogonal (vec A T) (vec O A) -> R (double (cons (vec A T) (vec A B))) (cons (vec O A) (vec O B))
isocele_permute : forall A B C : PO, isocele A B C -> R (plus (cons (vec A C) (vec A B)) (double (cons (vec B A) (vec B C)))) pi
triangle_isocele : forall A B C : PO, isocele A B C -> R (plus (cons (vec A B) (vec A C)) (double (cons (vec B C) (vec B A)))) pi
opp_vect : forall A B : PO, vR (opp (vec A B)) (vec B A)
somme_triangle : forall A B C : PO, R (plus (cons (vec A B) (vec A C)) (plus (cons (vec B C) (vec B A)) (cons (vec C A) (vec C B)))) pi
v_vec : forall (u : V) (A : PO), exists B : PO, vR u (vec A B)
Decidable.dec_imp : forall A B : Prop, Decidable.decidable A -> Decidable.decidable B -> Decidable.decidable (A -> B)
Inductive prod (A B : Type) : Type := pair : A -> B -> A * B Arguments prod (_ _)%type_scope Arguments pair {A B}%type_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
ssrbool.if_expr : forall A : Type, bool -> A -> A -> A
Inductive clos_trans_1n (A : Type) (R : Relation_Definitions.relation A) (x : A) : A -> Prop := t1n_step : forall y : A, R x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_trans_1n A R x y | t1n_trans : forall y z : A, R x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_trans_1n A R y z -> Relation_Operators.clos_trans_1n A R x z Arguments Relation_Operators.clos_trans_1n _%type_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.t1n_step _%type_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.t1n_trans _%type_scope
app : forall A : Type, list A -> list A -> list A
BinNat.N.case_analysis : forall A : BinNums.N -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> A BinNums.N0 -> (forall n : BinNums.N, A (BinNat.N.succ n)) -> forall n : BinNums.N, A n
proj1_sig : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop), {x : A | P x} -> A
List.rev : forall A : Type, list A -> list A
Relation_Definitions.relation = fun A : Type => A -> A -> Prop : Type -> Type Arguments Relation_Definitions.relation _%type_scope
list_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), P l -> P (a :: l)%list) -> forall l : list A, P l
sig_of_sig2 : forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop), {x : A | P x & Q x} -> {x : A | P x}
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments Datatypes.cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
proj1_sig_eq = fun (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (u v : {a : A | P a}) (p : u = v) => f_equal (proj1_sig (P:=fun a : A => P a)) p : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (u v : {a : A | P a}), u = v -> proj1_sig u = proj1_sig v Arguments proj1_sig_eq {A}%type_scope {P}%function_scope {u v}
sig_of_sig2_eq = fun (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop) (u v : {a : A | P a & Q a}) (p : u = v) => f_equal (sig_of_sig2 (Q:=fun a : A => Q a)) p : forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop) (u v : {a : A | P a & Q a}), u = v -> sig_of_sig2 u = sig_of_sig2 v Arguments sig_of_sig2_eq {A}%type_scope {P Q}%function_scope {u v}
non_vide_P : exists A : PO, A = A
Inductive sig2 (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop) : Type := exist2 : forall x : A, P x -> Q x -> {x : A | P x & Q x} Arguments sig2 [A]%type_scope (_ _)%type_scope Arguments exist2 [A]%type_scope (_ _)%function_scope
proj1_sig_of_sig2_eq = fun (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop) (u v : {a : A | P a & Q a}) (p : u = v) => proj1_sig_eq (sig_of_sig2_eq p) : forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop) (u v : {a : A | P a & Q a}), u = v -> proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 u) = proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 v) Arguments proj1_sig_of_sig2_eq {A}%type_scope {P Q}%function_scope {u v}
Inductive option (A : Type) : Type := Some : A -> option A | None : option A Arguments option _%type_scope Arguments Some {A}%type_scope a : rename Arguments None {A}%type_scope
Setoid.Seq_refl : forall (A : Type) (Aeq : Relation_Definitions.relation A), Setoid.Setoid_Theory A Aeq -> forall x : A, Aeq x x
ssrbool.mem = fun (T : Type) (pT : ssrbool.predType T) => let '{| ssrbool.pred_sort := pred_sort; ssrbool.topred := toP |} as pT0 := pT return (ssrbool.pred_sort pT0 -> ssrbool.mem_pred T) in fun A : ssrbool.pred_sort {| ssrbool.pred_sort := pred_sort; ssrbool.topred := toP |} => ssrbool.Mem (T:=T) (fun x : T => toP A x) : forall (T : Type) (pT : ssrbool.predType T), ssrbool.pred_sort pT -> ssrbool.mem_pred T Arguments ssrbool.mem {T}%type_scope {pT} A : rename, simpl never
